name: Opendesignwwtp
tagline: OpenDesignWWTP is an open-source web-based application for wastewater treatment plant design
body:
OpenDesignWWTP ==============

Description

OpenDesignWWTP is an open-source wastewater treatment plant design program. OpenDesignWWTP does not require you to download or install anything to your PC/Laptop/Mobile Device, simply visit http://heyang.xyz/opendesignwwtp and start the wonderful design journey.

Documentation

Documentation includes Developer Doc and User Doc https://github.com/he-yang/OpenDesignWWTP/wiki

Contact

Project lead: he-yang, email : he at heyang dot xyz

Contribution and Cooperation wanted

Contribution and cooperation wanted. If you know javascript, html, css, python, project cost estimation, wastewater treatment plant design, website design ........ and you are intested in contribution to this project, please let us know.

Community

There is a forum available http://forum.heyang.xyz where users, developers could share great ideas.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
